Title: Ben 10: Secret of the Omnitrix
Writer: Joe Casey (creator), Joe Kelly (creator), Duncan Rouleau (creator), Steven T. Seagle (creator), Tom Pugsley, Greg Klein, Man of Action (creator)
Actors: Tara Strong, Meagan Moore, Paul Eiding, Dwight Schultz
Plot: When the Omnitrix begins a countdown to self-destruction, Ben and Gwen team up with Tetrax to find the watch's creator before it's too late.
